page.title: 18The Farmer's day in Summer 1
page.content: In the summer between milking I have various jobs such as check the cows for disease check electric fences,fertilise the fields cut the silage as soon as possible,cut back hedges, move electric fences so that the cows can grase in a different part of the field.I let the calves out in warm weather,and afterwards check them for disease.In the summer when I feed them I give them 14% protein in their milking food.The summer is healthier,for cows because they are out in the fields not in the yard. In winter I have other different jobs to do.I get up at 6.00am.to milk the cows.the cows have to be milked twice a day 365 days a year.First I have to wash the cows teets and connect them to the machine.A cow eats 4 pounds of cow pellets for every gallon of milk.
